value: After the timer reaches 0, <u><color=red><link=Detonate>Detonate</link>s</color></u> and does 3 damage to the affected fighter then <u><color=red><link=Stun>Stun</link>s</color></u> that fighter. Can only be applied to fighters.
Sets the timer of a <u><color=red><link=Bomb>Bomb</link></color></u> to 0 and immediately apply its effects.
The affected <link=Combatant><u><color=yellow>Combatant</color></u></link> is unable to attack and use 'While Deployed' effects.
Cards that can battle,(Gods and Fighters).
At the end of each turn, the affected fighter loses 1 health and max health. This is not treated as taking damage.Can only be applied to  fighters.
At the end of each turn, the affected <link=Combatant><u><color=yellow>Combatant</color></u></link> takes 2 damage.

The affected <link=Combatant><u><color=yellow>Combatant</color></u></link> cannot take any actions(attack or use ability) and disables any <link=Combat Buff><u><color=blue>Combat Buff</link>s</color></u>.

Reduces damage taken by the indicated amount. Cannot stack with itself, the highest value is applied and equal or lower armor effects are nullified. This is a <u><color=blue><link=Defensive Buff>Defensive Buff</link></color></u>.
Enemy <u><color=yellow> <link=Combatant>Combatant</link>s</color></u> must target this card for attacks. This is a <u><color=blue><link=Targeting Buff>Targeting Buff</link></color></u>.
A <u><color=blue><link=Defensive Buff>Defensive Buff</link></color></u> or <u><color=blue><link=Targeting Buff>Targeting Buff</link></color></u>.

A Buff that affects targeting(<u><color=blue><link=Taunt>Taunt</link></color></u>, <u><color=blue><link=Camouflage>Camouflage</link></color></u>, <u><color=blue><link=Stealth>Stealth</link></color></u>). These do not stack and will replace any targeting buffs and debuffs previously applied on the target.

Value: A debuff that affects targeting().These do not stack and will replace any targeting buffs and debuffs previously applied on the target.

value: Negates instances of damage up to the indicated amount. This is a <u><color=blue><link=Defensive Buff>Defensive Buff</link></color></u>.

Absorbs damage taken. If the damage is greater than the <color=blue>barrier</color>, the remaining damage is done to the target's health.  This is a <u><color=blue><link=Defensive Buff>Defensive Buff</link></color></u>.

Enemy cards cannot target this card with effects while there are other valid <u><color=yellow> <link=Combatant>Combatant</link>s</color></u> targets on field. This is a <u><color=blue><link=Targeting Buff>Targeting Buff</link></color></u>.

Enemy <u><color=yellow> <link=Combatant>Combatant</link>s</color></u> cannot target this card for attacks while there are other valid <u><color=yellow> <link=Combatant>Combatant</link>s</color></u> targets on field. This is a <u><color=blue><link=Targeting Buff>Targeting Buff</link></color></u>.
